column4: hi, does anyone know how to load up the boot log? i saw a Bios Bug error message, but it then continued to load
bios messages you can't see, but everythin after linux starts can be viewed with the dmesg command.
no its not a bios message, its a message that shows when linux starts, so il have a loog at dmesg then
dmesg | less makes it a lot more readable.
